metadata.creator: Commission on Elections, Republic of the Philippines
metadata.description: This document contains plebiscite to ratify or reject proposed amendments to the Constitution. Batas Pambansa Bilang 122, fixed April 7, 1981, as the date of the plebiscite when proposed amendments shall be submitted to the electorate for their consideration.
metadata.subject: Constitutional amendments
metadata.title: Primer on the Plebiscite of the proposed Constitutional Amendments.
